messages.message: Not sure the right place to ask about this, but this is a file dump from FRB; they want to know if we can separate these out into discrete documents and then process them (processing is the easy part right now; it’s the doc splitting + OCR that’s at issue)
i see some docs contain things like “page 1 of…” which makes splitting easier, but i believe it will take multiple approaches to split these docs out correctly
no idea how extensible splitting is
